Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;beer^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;啤酒^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: Cheers! Now that you can make your own beer, your life is one step closer to perfection.
Texts.Chs: 哇！现在你可以制作属于你自己的啤酒了，你离完美的生活又近了一步！

Texts.Eng: It's ^blue;beer time^white;! Go to your ^orange;Fermenter^white; to make ^green;3 Beer^white;. You'll need 1 Wort, 2 Hops, 2 Wheat, 1 Yeast Water and 1 Empty Bottle.
Texts.Chs: 快来参加^blue;啤酒狂欢日^white;！用^orange;发酵罐^white;酿造出^green;啤酒^white;吧。你需要的材料有：1份麦芽汁，2份啤酒花，2份小麦，1份酵母水还有1个空瓶。
